welcome_message_body: Welcome to Singapore, a vibrant city known for its stunning skyline, delicious cuisine, and rich cultural diversity. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all the charm and beauty our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Peperoni Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Peperoni Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Singapore.

restaurants.name: 73@Hillcrest
restaurants.description: 73@Hillcrest is a bistro located in Bukit Timah.

restaurants.name: Flagwhite
restaurants.description: Flagwhite is a café located in Singapore.

restaurants.name: Al-Azhar Eating Restaurant
restaurants.description: Al-Azhar Eating Restaurant is a indian restaurant located in Singapore.

restaurants.name: BBQ Box
restaurants.description: BBQ Box is a bbq joint located in Singapore.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, known for its unique butterfly garden and serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and smallest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, designed to handle low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'ChangiWiFi' network and follow the instructions to get online.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hang Nadim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hang Nadim Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sultan Ismail International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Low Cost Carrier Terminal
terminals.description: The Low Cost Carrier Terminal is a separate terminal for budget airlines operating at Sultan Ismail International Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
